analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0xa3b5fdeb5dbc592ffc5e222223376464b9c56fb8.sol:
	Contract FixedSupplyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0xa3b5fdeb5dbc592ffc5e222223376464b9c56fb8.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0xa3b5fdeb5dbc592ffc5e222223376464b9c56fb8.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
